alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 15 at 4:54PM CDT until September 15 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Rush County in central Kansas... Southern Ellis County in central Kansas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 453 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Schoenchen, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hays, Schoenchen, Liebenthal, Yocemento, Pfeifer, Toulon, Munjor, Antonino and Loretta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
